title: Concert Etiquette (feat. Jim Breuer & Shane Gillis)
description: DJ Lou gets drunk and disappears at Gary Clark Jr. concert. Jay, Christine, and Shane Gillis talk about seeing a dead body driving back from Baltimore. Jim Breuer joins the show and shares stories about opening for Metallica on their latest tour.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
content:encoded: DJ Lou gets drunk and disappears at Gary Clark Jr. concert. Jay, Christine, and Shane Gillis talk about seeing a dead body driving back from Baltimore. Jim Breuer joins the show and shares stories about opening for Metallica on their latest tour.
